8d24df3b-c2d3-4335-b172-fdedf2e02189.description: Earners of the ForgeRock Access Management Core Skills badge have a strong foundation for the design, installation, configuration, and administration of ForgeRock Access Management (AM). Earners are System Integrators, Administrators, and Developers who have demonstrated the skills required to protect a website with ForgeRock Access Management and are capable of implementing a complete access management solution.
8d24df3b-c2d3-4335-b172-fdedf2e02189.name: ForgeRock Access Management Core Skills

badge_template_activities.title: Must complete the ForgeRock Access Management Deep Dive Course (AM-410) and all the required lessons and lab exercises.

0815e99e-dd49-4384-bbd4-3d738051e1c5.description: Earners of the ForgeRock Access Management Product Knowledge badge have received a high-level overview of the core ForgeRock Access Management (AM) functionality and understand the advantages and functionality of ForgeRock Access Management as the single sign-on and federation infrastructure product.
0815e99e-dd49-4384-bbd4-3d738051e1c5.name: ForgeRock Access Management Product Knowledge

badge_template_activities.title: Must complete the ForgeRock Access Management Essentials course via Backstage.

a36f2145-94b5-469d-b30b-1fcfded22420.description: Earners of the ForgeRock Identity Management Product Knowledge badge have received a high-level overview of the core ForgeRock Identity Management (IDM) functionality and understand the advantages and functionality of ForgeRock Identity Management.
a36f2145-94b5-469d-b30b-1fcfded22420.name: ForgeRock Identity Management Product Knowledge

badge_template_activities.title: Must complete all the lessons related to the Identity Management Essentials course.

0a2bf707-07f9-484a-9c6b-91c08187016e.description: Earners of the ForgeRock Identity Management Core Skills badge have a strong foundation for the implementation of ForgeRock Identity Management (IDM) to manage the complete identity lifecycle of users, devices, and things. Earners are System Integrators, Administrators, and Consultants who have demonstrated the knowledge required to configure, manage, and deploy ForgeRock Identity Management.
0a2bf707-07f9-484a-9c6b-91c08187016e.name: ForgeRock Identity Management Core Skills

badge_template_activities.title: Must complete the ForgeRock Identity Management Core Concepts Course (IDM-420) and all the required lessons and lab exercises.

df2dda3b-6740-4c2e-b520-b33e112cbd4c.description: Earners of the ForgeRock Directory Services Core Skills badge have a strong foundation in the skills necessary to perform routine maintenance and troubleshooting techniques on ForgeRock Directory Services. Earners are System Administrators, Integrators, and Architects who monitor and tune servers, create and manage multiple databases, and perform other tasks with ForgeRock Directory Services.
df2dda3b-6740-4c2e-b520-b33e112cbd4c.name: ForgeRock Directory Services Core Skills

badge_template_activities.title: Must complete the ForgeRock Directory Services Deep Dive Course (DS-440) and all the required lessons and lab exercises.

85da76c3-2b6e-48f8-91d4-0500250513ad.description: Earners of the ForgeRock Identity Cloud Core Skills badge have a high-level understanding of how ForgeRock® Identity Cloud (Identity Cloud) works, through the various online resources available to them, to a fully functional hands-on development environment, where they learn how to implement the many features of Identity Cloud in a training environment.
85da76c3-2b6e-48f8-91d4-0500250513ad.name: ForgeRock Identity Cloud Core Skills

badge_template_activities.title: Must complete the Getting Started with ForgeRock® Identity Cloud Course (IC-300) and all the required lessons and lab exercises.

c514ecc4-d175-4dd3-8afa-67fbb2e2a7f0.description: Earners of the ForgeRock Directory Services Product Knowledge badge have received a high-level overview of the core ForgeRock Directory Services (DS) functionality and understand the advantages and functionality of ForgeRock Directory Services.

badge_template_activities.title: Must complete all lesson associated with the ForgeRock Directory Services Essentials course.

68b86c68-f2ea-42eb-b3f3-4c6c3e61193e.description: Earners of the ForgeRock Certified Access Management Specialist badge are IT professionals responsible for administering and deploying ForgeRock Access Management solutions. ae955e3c-1726-4059-9988-e6e75128d026.description: Earners of the ForgeRock Identity Gateway Product Knowledge badge have received a high-level overview of the core ForgeRock Identity Gateway (IG) functionality and understand the advantages and functionality of ForgeRock Identity Gateway.

892a3633-3130-49b2-bdd5-1cf82d9a993e.description: Earners of the ForgeRock Identity Gateway Core Skills badge have a strong foundation for the configuration of ForgeRock Identity Gateway (IG) to help extend access to and protect web applications, application programming interfaces (APIs), and devices and things within an access management solution). Earners are System Integrators, Administrators, and Developers who have demonstrated the skills to plan, install, configure, and administer a ForgeRock Identity Gateway deployment.

c527c2df-c90e-4a5b-9113-4385b292db74.description: Earners of the ForgeRock Access Management Advanced Skills badge have demonstrated the knowledge and skill necessary to extend and integrate an Access Management deployment in a real-world context using REST APIs. 75dbca4e-7a0b-437d-a131-1b2725afe066.description: Earners of the ForgeRock DevOps Advanced Skills badge have demonstrated the knowledge and skill necessary to deploy the ForgeRock Identity Platform to a cluster running in the Google Kubernetes Environment (GKE). Earners are developers responsible for configuring and deploying the ForgeRock Identity Platform using DevOps techniques.
